However, we may share your information with third-party service providers who perform services on our behalf.
Our App collects information in a few different ways:
Please note that we may disclose your information to our affiliates and in the event of an acquisition, sale, or asset sale, your Personal Data may be transferred.
We use cookies to personalize your experience on Suggestly, remember your preferences, and understand usage patterns.
We may collect information about the device you're using to access Suggestly, including the type of device, operating system, and browser.
We collect your IP address to ensure a secure and stable connection to Suggestly.

This includes any personal info you've made publicly available on your Google profile.
We use this information to customize user experience.
As part of the regular operation of Suggestly, we collect standard application use data to improve your experience, secure your interactions, and streamline our service.
